main.name: Roopa Singam
main.description: I'm a Frontend Developer and my go-to technologies are ReactJs, Javascript and Node.js . Full Stack Enthusiastic
main.bio: Enthusiastic UI Developer with  2 years of professional experience  in successfully building the front end of various websites.I am fluent in classics like C, Java and Javascript. My current focus is on  Machine Learning and DataScience.Whenever possible, I also apply my passion for developing projects with Modern Javascript Frameworks  like Node.js and React.js.
